certificates.title: Spacecraft Certification
certificates.description: Certification that shows you understand how to operate the space-craft and know emergency procedures.
certificates.instructions: To receive training for this certification, book any of our flights and show the booking confirmation to the front-desk advisor at any of SpaceX's Starbases or NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory to receive training lessons from them. Receive training lessons for 1 week.

certificates.alt: Two guys in spacesuits inside a spaceship
certificates.title: Gravitational Adaptability Certification
certificates.description: Certification that shows you can adapt to different gravitational pulls and handle high G-Forces.
certificates.instructions: To receive training for this certification, Book any of our flights and show the booking confirmation to the front-desk advisor at any of SpaceX's Starbases or NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory to receive training lessons from them. Receive training lessons for 2 weeks.

certificates.alt: Two astronauts participating in a training exercise.
certificates.title: Extra-terrestrial Terrain Certification
certificates.description: Certification that shows you are aware of the dangers on the terrain of other planets and can successfully and safely navigate them.
certificates.instructions: To receive training for this certification, Book a flight to the Moon or Mars and show the booking confirmation to the front-desk advisor at any of SpaceX's Starbases or NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory to receive training lessons from them. Receive training lessons for 3 days.

certificates.title: Deep Space Travel Certification
certificates.description: Certification that shows you know the risks of deep space travel, understand how cryosleep works, and how to enter and exit cryosleep.
certificates.instructions: To receive training for this certification, Book a flight to Mars and show the booking confirmation to the front-desk advisor at any of SpaceX's Starbases or NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory to receive training lessons from them. Receive training lessons for 1 month.

certificates.title: Space Walk Certification
certificates.description: Certification that shows you know how the procedure of a space walk, and how to safely perform one.
certificates.instructions: To receive training for this certification, Book any of our flights and show the booking confirmation to the front-desk advisor at any of SpaceX's Starbases or NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory to receive training lessons from them. Receive training lessons for 2 weeks.

stages.title: Liftoff
stages.description: The rocket launches from the launchpad.

stages.title: Max-Q
stages.description: The moment where the rocket experiences maximum dynamic pressure.

stages.title: MECO
stages.description: The moment when the booster of the rocket cuts-off and separates.

stages.title: Booster Catch
stages.description: The Booster slows down and is caught by the launch pad.

stages.title: SECO
stages.description: The upper stage engine cuts off and the rocket is now in Earth Orbit

stages.title: Second Rocket Launch
stages.description: The second rocket launches from the launch pad and performs all the prior stages.

stages.title: Refueling
stages.description: The two upper stages dock in orbit and the fuel from the second launched one goes to the first one.

stages.title: Atmospheric Braking
stages.description: After entering the atmosphere of Mars, the rocket turns to aerodynamically brake.

stages.title: Propulsive Braking
stages.description: The rocket turns on its engines to slow down.

stages.title: Landing
stages.description: The rocket lands on the surface of Mars.

videos.title: How Stoke Space's Unique Rocket Works // Exclusive Tour & Interview
